#sidebar Sidebar

== _class_ !CssError ==
This is a helper class used to format an error message.

{{{
trigger_error(new CssError("Unterminated ruleset declaration", "padding: 5px_"), E_USER_WARNING);
}}}
----

=== Properties ===
==== public_ `string` $Message = "" ====
Error message.
----

==== public_ `string` $Source = "" ====
Corresponding source of the error.
----

=== Methods ===
==== `void` _public_ __construct(`string` $message, `string` $source = "") ====
Constructor setting the error message and corresponding source.
 * `string` $message : Error message
 * `string` $source : Corresponding source of the error (optional)
 * *Returns:* `void`
----

==== `string` _public_ __toString() ====
Returns the error as formatted string.
 * *Returns:* `string`
----
